venue.name: The Playwright Irish Pub and Restaurant in Hamden

item.description:
Well, we're almost there, My fellow travelers!!!

We're getting together to celebrate and plan our strategy. We'll meet and choose our sightseeing options, listen to some traditional Irish music, share a great Irish meal and meet all our fellow travelers. If you need a roommate ...we'll be doing that as well.

We'll have a pint (or two) in the pub between 3 and 5 pm, while listening to some great music and discuss our travel options. At 5 pm we'll move into the restaurant to break bread...Irish style!

So come join us at our pre-Ireland get together and join in the fun! I want to welcome each and every one of you and we will all get together to introduce ourselves to one another.

Also, I have great news...I have been in touch with a Meetup group in Ireland and we are planning a meetup together. This is a meetup group based in Dublin with over 1200 members. Wow...we are gonna have a blast!

So try to make it on this special day so we can reunite with old friends, or make new ones. NEXT STOP...DUBLIN!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on the table/ ask for Terri Bruno's table!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Irish Dinner, Music and Plannng Strategy for My Irish Travelers!
